ARABIC: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ أُرْسِلْنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'We have been sent to a people of evildoers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They said: "We have been sent to a wicked people
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They replied: “Behold, we have been sent to a wicked people
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They replied, "We have been sent to a sinful people
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “We have been sent towards a guilty nation.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "We have been sent to a people who are criminals."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: Surely we are sent to a guilty people,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'We have been sent to a people of sinners,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: Lo! we are sent unto a guilty folk,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They replied, "We have been sent to a sinful people,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: verily we are sent Unto a people, guilty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘We have been sent toward a guilty people,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said, "We have been sent to a people (deep) in sin;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said: "We have been sent to a people who are Mujrimun (polytheists, sinners, criminals, disbelievers in Allah);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They replied: 'We are sent to a sinful nation,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “We are sent to a people guilty of sin.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:32] They said, ‘Lo! we have been sent to a guilty folk, disbelievers — these were the people of Lot —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said: Lo! we are sent unto a guilty folk) idolatrous folk who brought ruin upon themselves because of engaging in an abominable act; referring here to the folk of Lot,
